name: Websurfer
description:
A short survival typing game about searching the web for enlightenment. And survival. This is a  submission for Roguelike Jam 2

Seek enlightenment. Get educated.

You are a random guy who decides to seek enlightenment through the help of the all-knowing internet. Whether you search using phrases like 'nearby hospital', 'little tummy demands immediate attention', or 'getting scammed how to get money back', you need to keep seeking for wisdom, knowledge, and guidance to make sure you satisfy your needs. How long can you stand against the test of time?

Programming and Art
muhamadmentari

Music Used
LAKEY INSPIRED - Watching the Clouds
Dixxy - New Horizon
Dixxy - Midnight Cigarette
